description: LUVVITT introduces SILVERBACKTM Protective Back Skin for iPad 4 / iPad 3 / iPad 2 (one size fits all). This multi-layer back skin features a new, cutting edge technology that is pressure activated which means you can easily stick, remove and reposition your SILVERBACKTM skin during installation process. And once you align it perfectly with your iPad, as you wipe the skin with your finger, the pressure activated micro-glass beads will fit your iPad like a true skin. SILVERBACKTM Skin by Luvvitt leaves no adhesive residues on your iPad once you remove. This high performance and durable skin has the same color of the aluminum back of your iPad and it's scratch resistant. Keep the sleek look of your iPad with SILVERBACKTM Skin by Luvvitt while protecting it from dirt and scratches.
title: Luvvitt® SILVERBACK (TM) Protective Back Skin for the new iPad 4 / iPad 3 / iPad 2 - Compatible with Smart Cover - Aluminum Color
